thread.title: China Reinsurance Plans $2 Billion IPO
thread.title_full: China Reinsurance Plans $2 Billion IPO - WSJ

author: Yvonne Lee
title: China Reinsurance Plans $2 Billion IPO
text:
HONG KONG—China Reinsurance (Group) Corp. plans to raise up to US$2 billion in an initial public offering in Hong Kong, which is set to be the biggest listing in the city since Chinese stock markets collapsed in June.
If successful, the listing by China’s biggest reinsurer would be the first major offering in Hong Kong in the fourth quarter. China Re has secured US$1.1 billion in investments from cornerstone investors, improving its... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
